mapper.select: select b.board_pk , b.user_pk , b.board_title , b.board_body , DATE_FORMAT(b.board_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS boardRegDate , b.board_view_count , u.user_name from board b left join user u on b.user_pk = u.user_pk;
select b.board_pk , b.user_pk , b.board_title , b.board_body , b.board_reg_date , b.board_view_count , u.user_name from board b left join user u on b.user_pk = u.user_pk where b.board_pk = #{id}

select c.comment_pk , c.board_pk , c.user_pk , c.comment_body , DATE_FORMAT(c.comment_reg_date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS commentRegDate , u.user_name from board_comment c left join user u on c.user_pk = u.user_pk where c.board_pk = #{id};
